rdfs:label: version
dc:description: The semantic version of this schema.
rdfs:comment: Maps HedHeader into its schema version.

rdfs:label: library
dc:description: The name of the library schema if applicable, otherwise an empty string.
rdfs:comment: Maps HedHeader into its library name if this is a library schema.

rdfs:label: unmerged
dc:description: If true, the schema is not merged with a partner schema.
rdfs:comment: Maps HedHeader into an indicator of whether this is a library merged with its standard schema partner.

rdfs:label: withStandard
dc:description: The version of the HED schema's standard schema partner.
rdfs:comment: Maps HedHeader into the version number of the standard schema it is partnered with (libraries only)
